content.body: Of course.  The [TC39 in Helsinki room](https://matrix.to/#/!eYtJlOBqHCxsUknCCE:matrix.org?via=matrix.org&via=mozilla.org) for in-person coordination (e.g. "who wants to find a karaeoke bar?", "how do I travel from the airport?") is now created.  Ask a chair to invite you if you have not already received an invite.
